General.Name: Daqin Railway Co Ltd
General.Description: Daqin Railway Co., Ltd. provides railway transportation services in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company transports coal, coke, steel, ores, containers, and loose bulk goods. It also provides railway passenger services; and services to other domestic railway transportation enterprises, including locomotive traction, freight car use, line use, freight car repair, etc. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Taiyuan, the People's Republic of China. Daqin Railway Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Rail Way Taiyuan Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 202, Jianshe North Road, Taiyuan, China, 030013
